card.name: Falling Anvil
card.text: Falling Anvil deals damage to target creature equal to the number of artifacts you control.

card.name: Mind Control Hat
card.text: Whenever Mind Control Hat is equipped to a creature, gain control of it until it is unequipped. {3}{U}{U}, {T}: Attach Mind Control Hat. You may activate the ability of another Gadget you control without paying its mana cost. Activate only during your main phase.

card.name: Wil.E Coyote, Gourmet
card.text: Vigilance, zany (Whenever this creature dies, shuffle it into its owner's library.) Whenever you activate the ability of an artifact, you may sacrifice it. When you do so, it deals damage equal to its mana value to any target and to Wil.E Coyote. Then, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

card.name: Close Down
card.text: Whenever this enchantment or an artifact enters under your control, create a 2/2 white and blue Toon Detective creature token with vigilance. This ability only trigger once per turn.

card.name: Cog Gang
card.text: Stretch (When you cast this spell, you may pay any amount of life.) Menace Whenever this creature enters, for each 3 life paid to cast it, create a token that's a copy of it.

card.name: Trickster Wolf
card.text: Trample, Zany (Whenever this creature dies, shuffle it into its owner's library.) Inertia (At the beginning of your end step, if you cast a spell this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Otherwise, remove all counters from this creature at the beginning of the next turn.)

card.name: Duck Season, Rabbit Season
card.text: Whenever a spell would counter another spell, counter the first spell instead.

card.name: The Big Bad Wolf
card.text: Stretch (When you cast this spell, you may pay any amount of life.) When this creatures enters, each players sacrifice X non-Wolf creature, where X is the amount of life paid to cast it. For each creature sacrificed this way, put a +1/+1 counter on The Big Bad Wolf.

card.name: Laidback Cat
card.text: Lifelink, Zany (Whenever this creature dies, shuffle it into its owner's library.) Inertia (At the beginning of your end step, if you cast a spell this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Otherwise, remove all counters from this creature at the beginning of the next turn.)

card.name: Shady Mafioso
card.text: Stretch (When you cast this spell, you may pay any amount of life.) Shady Mafioso enters with a +1/+1 counter if you paid 2 or more life to cast it.

card.name: Mysterious Doors
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Surprise {1}{G}{G} ({1}{G}{G}, discard this card: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card with the same mana value. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

card.name: Human Seeking Gun
card.text: When this artifact enters, create a 1/1 red Toon creature token. {1}{R}{R}, {T}: This artifact deals 1 damage to each opponent. You may activate the ability of a Gadget you control without paying its mana cost. Activate only during your main phase.

card.name: Ride the Rocket
card.text: Stretch (When you cast this spell, you may pay any amount of life.) Ride the Rocket deals 3 damage to target creature. If you paid 3 or more life to cast this spell, it deals 5 damage instead.

card.name: Temporary Jetpacks
card.text: When this artifact enters, create a 1/1 red Toon creature token. {1}{U}{U}, {T}: Up to two creatures you control gain flying until end of turn. You may activate the ability of a Gadget you control without paying its mana cost. Activate only during your main phase.

card.name: Unlucky Accident
card.text: Creatures your opponents control can't block this turn. Surprise {2}{R}{R} ({2}{R}{R}, discard this card: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card with the same mana value. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

card.name: Quickshot Duo
card.text: Menace, zany (Whenever this creature dies, shuffle it into its owner's library.) Inertia (At the beginning of your end step, if you cast a spell this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Otherwise, remove all counters from this creature at the beginning of the next turn.)

card.name: Wrong Turn at Albuquerque
card.text: Counter target spell Surprise {2}{U}{U} ({2}{U}{U}, discard this card: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card with the same mana value. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

card.name: Rise to the Fight
card.text: Stretch (When you cast this spell, you may pay any amount of life.) Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the amount of life paid to cast this card. Put up to three creature cards with mana value 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Zoinks!
card.text: Destroy target creature with mana value two or less. Surprise {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, discard this card: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card with the same mana value. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

card.name: Shaggy, All Alone
card.text: Haste Inertia (At the beginning of your end step, if you cast a spell this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Otherwise, remove all counters from this creature at the beginning of the next turn.) Whenever this creature attack, if it has three or more +1/+1 counters, double its power. It gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: The Powerpuff Girls
card.text: Flying, vigilance, lifelink Inertia (At the beginning of your end step, if you cast a spell this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Otherwise, remove all counters from this creature at the beginning of the next turn.) At the beginning of your upkeep, if this creature has three or more +1/+1 counters, it gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Mean Giant
card.text: Stretch (When you cast this spell, you may pay any amount of life.) Trample This creature enters with an additional +1/+1 counter for each 2 life paid to cast it.

card.name: The Mystery Machine
card.text: Crew 3 Inertia (At the beginning of your end step, if you cast a spell this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this artifact. Otherwise, remove all counters from this artifact.) Whenever you remove counters from this artifact, create that many Food tokens. {2}, {T}, sacrifice a Food: Draw a card.

card.name: Terrible Wolfman
card.text: Trample Surprise {2}{G}{G} ({2}{G}{G}, discard this card: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card with the same mana value. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

card.name: Spinach Can
card.text: Whenever this artifact enters, draw a card. {4}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life. Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. If you activate this ability during your main phase, you may activate the ability of a Gadget you control without paying its mana cost

card.name: The Script
card.text: Whenever this artifact enters, scry 1. {5}, {T}: Draw a card. If you activate this ability during your main phase, you may activate the ability of a Gadget you control without paying its mana cost

card.name: Yosemite Sam, Angry Cowboy
card.text: Whenever you pay life, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. It deals 1 damage to each opponent. {3}{B}{R}, Pay 2 life: Exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.

card.name: Spongebob Squarepants
card.text: Inertia (At the beginning of your end step, if you cast a spell this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Otherwise, remove all counters from this creature at the beginning of the next turn.) Whenever a counter is removed from this this creature, draw that many cards and create that many Food tokens.

card.name: Fairly Odd Wand
card.text: Whenever this artifact enters, create a 1/1 white Fairy creature token with flying. {1}{W}{W}, {T}: Create a 1/1 white Fairy creature token with flying. You may activate the ability of another Gadget you control without paying its mana cost. Activate only during your main phase.

card.name: Big Brawl
card.text: Create two 1/1 red Warrior creature tokens. Creatures you control gain haste and menace until end of turn.

card.name: Yogi Bear, Friendly Ursine
card.text: Inertia (At the beginning of your end step, if you cast a spell this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Otherwise, remove all counters from this creature at the beginning of the next turn.) +1/+1 counters on creatures you control can't be removed outside of costs.

card.name: Robot Maid
card.text: Vigilance, zany (Whenever this creature dies, shuffle it into its owner's library.) {3}, Sacrifice this creature: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Moomin Trolls
card.text: Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, this creature gains +1/+1 and lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Protective Shark
card.text: Zany (Whenever this creature dies, shuffle it into its owner's library.) Whenever this creature enters, create a 1/1 blue Merfolk creature token. This creature can't attack if you don't control a Merfolk.

card.name: Cockroach Gang
card.text: Stretch (When you cast this spell, you may pay any amount of life.) Whenever this creature enters, if you payed 2 or more life to cast it, each opponents discard a card.

card.name: Smurf Villager
card.text: Whenever a Smurf enters under your control, this creature gains +1/+1 until end of turn. Scry 1. A deck can have any number of cards named Smurf Villager.

card.name: Explosive Result
card.text: This spell cost {1} less for each artifact ability you activated this turn. This spell deals 6 damage to target creature.

card.name: Pink Panther
card.text: Stretch (When you cast this spell, you may pay any amount of life.) At the beginning of your end step, if you paid 2 or more life this turn, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Henchcat
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Gravity is a Harsh Mistress
card.text: Destroy target attacking creature without flying. Surprise {1}{W} ({1}{W}, discard this card: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card with the same mana value. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

card.name: Obsessive Chase
card.text: This spell cost {1} less if it target a creature that entered this turn. (Yours, or your opponent's) Target creature you control fight target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

card.name: Anchor Down
card.text: Enchant creature When this Aura enters, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. At the beginning of enchanted creature's controller end step, if they didn't cast a spell this turn, they untap enchanted creature.

card.name: Mean Hook
card.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to any target. If this spell target a player, it cost {R} more.
